Infernal Wrath.name: Infernal Wrath
Infernal Wrath.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
Infernal Wrath.flavor: You call upon the hellfire burning in your soul to punish your enemy.
Infernal Wrath.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you hits you.
Infernal Wrath.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Infernal Wrath.effect:
The target takes 1d6 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier fire damage.
    Level 11: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier fire damage.
    Level 21: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier fire damage.

Hellish Gaze.name: Hellish Gaze
Hellish Gaze.flavor: Seeing doom reflected in your fiery eyes, your enemy turns away from your countenance.
Hellish Gaze.target: One creature that can see you
Hellish Gaze.effect: Make a Bluff check opposed by the target’s passive Insight. If the check succeeds, you can push the target 1 square, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks against you until the start of your next turn.

Grim Isolation.name: Grim Isolation
Grim Isolation.flavor: You don’t need help. You can protect yourself just fine.
Grim Isolation.effect: You assume the grim isolation stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses while no ally is adjacent to you.

Hellfire Shroud.name: Hellfire Shroud
Hellfire Shroud.flavor: Flickering black flames swirl around you to shield you from harm and punish those who would attack you.
Hellfire Shroud.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses. In addition, whenever an enemy adjacent to you hits you with a melee attack, that enemy takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Eternal Returns.name: Eternal Returns
Eternal Returns.flavor: Your defeat opens a door for your return to the world.
Eternal Returns.effect: You are removed from play until the start of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, you can spend a healing surge, and you return to play in an unoccupied space within 5 squares of the last space you occupied.
